abstract.p: Sandpearl Resort in Clearwater, first Florida resort designed to meet standards of US Green Building Council's rating system, is set to open in August (S)

block.p: The first Florida resort designed to meet the standards of the United States Green Building Council's rating system is set to open this August.

The Sandpearl Resort, in Clearwater Beach, will have a geothermal system to heat the pool and spas by capturing solar energy stored in the soil, and an energy management system that regulates room temperatures based on occupancy (occupied rooms are kept cooler). It will also have a salt bromine pool-filtration system, eliminating chlorine waste; a cool-water air-conditioning system that allows for higher quality air; and an ozone laundry system that reduces water consumption.
